text: Hagi Zedekaia'ma kinima mani'no egeno 9nima hia kafufina, 10ni ikamofona 10ni zupa, Babiloni kini ne' Nebukatnesa'a sondia vahe'aramine eno Jerusalemi kumara ha'hunte'naku eme avazagi kagine'za, manine'zama ha'ma hanaza zana, kuma keginamofo tva'ontera megi'a mopa kate'za ante hihi hu'za mareri'naze.
